arcanist.ability: Resist the Change: You have created powerful wards against the dark magic afflicting the land. You can never be TRANSFORMED
arcanist.description: A dabbler in the arcane and a seeker of secrets. Her occult knowledge is peerless. She carries the Stiletto, and is immune to being TRANSFORMED.

archeologist.ability: Freedom: Your skills have been honed to avoid the dangers of the unknown. You can never be IMMOBILIZED.
archeologist.description: A scholar possessing knowledge of things ancient and mystical. His favored weapon is a whip which he uses to hinder his foes. He can never be IMMOBILIZED.

avenging-madman.ability: Insanity: You are compelled to fling yourself into melee combat, making you unable to use Ranged weapons. You can never be DERANGED.
avenging-madman.description: A revenge driven farm-hand whose family was slaughtered by vampires. His rage has made him unstable but strong. He flings himself into combat with a Bale Hook. The Madman cannot be DERANGED and has outstanding nerve. As consequence, he is unable to use ranged weapons.

excorist.ability: Most Holy: Your holy spirit resists corruption that would normally afflict lesser men. You are never affected by BLOODLUST.
excorist.description: A holy man sent to purge the land of evil. He holds the Aspergillum, a weapon that can be filled with holy waters. He is immune to BLOODLUST, and can revitalize his allies through prayer.

telepath.ability: Psychic Fortitude: You may resist being drained of Power Points. Treat situations as if you had zero Power Points to lose.
telepath.description: A talented mentalist who can access unique and powerful psychic abilities. She carries a quartz lantern that can focus the power of her mind to cause her enemies harm.

witch-hunter.ability: Fearless: You have encountered dangers that would make most mortals lose their sanity. You can never be SPOOKED.
witch-hunter.description: A fanatical bounty hunter sworn to undo all paganism. He is a tracker and a marksman with the crossbow. He is immune to being SPOOKED.
